amendment.description: Amendment sought to modify Sec. 1244 to include limitations on the development of an INF range ground-launched missile system.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in Part B of House Report 115-212 to modify Sec. 1244 to include limitations on the development of an INF range ground-launched missile system.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Blumenauer amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 173 - 249 (Roll no. 360).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Blumenauer amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 173 - 249 (Roll no. 360).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Blumenauer.
